turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you order me a coffee drink please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, from where would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From the one at 640 N 1st St, Tacoma, WA.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What temperature do you want it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get it extra hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, I will order you the Grande mocha with skim milk, extra chocolate, whip cream and extra hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, I can confirm your order at the 640 N 1st St, Tacoma, WA Starbucks, and it will be ready for pickup in five minutes. The receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. I appreciate your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure. Let me know if you need anything else. Goodbye.
